question: In a doc test (the part in comments in the above image), what does this section outline?

answers.feedback: Incorrect. Doc tests serve a specific purpose in documentation.

answers.answer: Comments made by TAs that they forgot to delete
answers.feedback: Incorrect. Doc tests are intentional parts of documentation.
Correct. Doc tests provide example test cases to illustrate how functions are used and to test their functionality.
Correct. Doc tests can serve as part of the documentation by providing examples of how the function is intended to be used.
